column3:
Megha Electronics ‚Äì 1 Phase Control Panel

The Megha Electronics 1-Phase Control Panel is a high-quality, reliable, and efficient solution designed to operate and protect single-phase electric motors and equipment. Built with precision and durable components, this panel ensures smooth performance, safety, and long operational life for residential, commercial, and industrial applications.

‚≠ê Key Features

Single Phase Operation: Suitable for 1PH pumps, motors, and machinery.

Advanced Protection System: Safeguards against overload, voltage fluctuation, short circuit, and dry run (optional).

Premium Quality Components: Uses heavy-duty switches, MCB/overload relay, and wiring for stable, long-term performance.

User-Friendly Design: Easy to install, operate, and maintain.

Weather & Dust Resistant Body: Strong enclosure for longer outdoor or indoor use (Metal/ABS as per model).

LED Indicators (Optional): Clear status display for Power, Load, and Fault conditions.

Key Features:
Fully automatic digital control panel for 2 ph
Digital LED display for Voltage, Current & Timer.
Inbuilt protections: overload, dry run, High /low Voltage Protection
Manual / Auto switch with easy ON/OFF operation.
Durable powder-coated MS body with wall-mount design.
Adjustable Timer Delay
Suitable for agriculture, industrial & domestic use.
Technical Specifications:
Model: MEGHA 2 PH Digital Auto Panel
Power: 440 Volt
Capacity: Upto 7.5 Hp
Input Terminals: L1, L2
Output Terminals: R, Y, B
Display: Digital LED (V, A, Timer)
Controls: Auto / Manual switch, Push buttons
Protection: Overload, Dry run, 
Enclosure: Powder-coated MS body

Key Features:
Fully Automatic Operation: Turns on automatically when power is restored.
Comprehensive Protection: Includes safeguards against dry run, overload, and single-phasing.
Digital Display: Shows real-time voltage and current. 
Cyclic Timer
High/Low Voltage Protection
Adjustable Delay Timer
In put :440v
Technical Specifications:
Motor Rating: Upto 7.5HP
Starter Type: Direct On-Line (DOL)
Automation Grade: Fully Automatic & Manual
Protection: Overload, Dry Run, Single Phase Preventer, Under/Over Voltage

Keyeatures:
Auto ON/OFF for 2 & 3 Phase 
Digital display (Volt, Amp, Timer)
Protects from overload,  low/high voltage
Manual & Auto mode with Switch
Heavy-duty MS powder-coated body
Cyclic Timer
Adjustable Time Delay

Specs:
Motor: Up to 7.5 HP
Input: 440 V AC (3 Phase RYB)
No need of external Starter
Timer: Adjustable
Wiring: RYB input/output,
